mapper.select: with tbs as(select 'floors' as name,count(1) as value from ( select floor from CommunityManagement.ds_Room where buildingId =#{buildingId} GROUP BY floor) as tmp union all select 'occRooms' as name, count(1) as value from CommunityManagement.ds_Room where buildingId = #{buildingId} and status =1 union all select 'empRooms' as name, count(1) as value from CommunityManagement.ds_Room where buildingId = #{buildingId} and status =0 union all select 'preResidents' as name, count(1) as value from CommunityManagement.ds_Room where buildingId =#{buildingId} and floor =1 ) SELECT a.value as 'floors', b.value as 'occRooms', c.value as 'empRooms', d.VALUE as 'preResidents' FROM tbs a,tbs b,tbs c,tbs d WHERE a.name='floors' AND b.name='occRooms' AND c.name='empRooms' and d.name = 'preResidents'
